nodes.text: The Bacrana system was a star system located within the Brak sector in the Expansion Region within the galaxy. The system consisted of five planets and an asteroid belt orbiting a yellow sun also known as Bacrana. Three of the planets were "small" gas giants, one was a superheated rock, and the second planet was the terrestrial world of Bacrana. The system was also home to the Bacrana Shipyards.
